item.title: [UTCTF 2020] Crack the heart
item.description: Author: supersnail For this challenge, I first noticed (like in every other writeups) a big structure of offsets, that pointed to “funclets” followed by jump with rcx-relative offsets. The relative jump function: The first funclet just checks for the process being debugged, the “load_r9” funclet that jumps to the next funclet after skipping “n” bytes of garbage.
